questionTitle: I tried ..................... the bus, but I missed it.

there was no electricity, I was able to write a letter to my friend because I had a candle.
Peter phones us, we'll go to the cafeteria.

Both my trousers ....................... from my changing room last night.
anwers: were and my shirts was stolen

questionTitle: Young children often spend their time playing, ......................., and sleeping.
